attributes.action: Refund all pension loses due to Gordon Browns theft or misuse of pension funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to G.Brown's head in the sand attitude to pensions, we amongst others now have to live on benefits and literally food parcels. Instead of a 6 to 8000 a year, I now only get about 2,500. Thank you Gordon!!I know I am not the only one, we had to leave the UK as otherwise we would be bankrupted by now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
